name: The Beach Boss
description:
Don’t let your beach be a bummer: be the Beach Boss!

Hungry tourists have taken over the beach! Become the Boss of the beach this summer by selling food and trinkets to your customers in the new endless running game from Chocolapps.

Collect coins for each successful transaction, but watch out for lifeguards, pets and police as they capture and kick you off the beach! Earn coins to pay a visit to the shop and purchase additional gear like special sandals, baskets, vehicles and more to better help you fend off your captors.

Key Features:
-        Dual controls help you avoid obstacles
-        Fantastic gameplay with sharp graphics
-        Find secret items scattered across the beach! Collect them all to unlock a special bonus
-        Unlock vehicles such as the skateboard, surfboard, or ATV
-        Pump iron or get that tan going to make yourself more appealing to your customers
-        Level up with upgrades from the shop
-        Share your score with friends on Facebook & Twitter
